attributes.action: All UK Public Buses To Be Disabled/Elderly Friendly By Law.
attributes.additional_details:
Public Buses in the UK have limited access for Disabled & Elderly, because not all Public Buses are guaranteed to be Disabled/Elderly friendly when it comes to the passenger using a Public Bus route.

I call upon the Department for Transport to create a Law for all UK Public Buses to be Disabled Friendly within 3 years of this petitions final phase.
